filterOther.sqlString: sample.consent_id IN ((select path999.consent_id from pdc_pathology_report path999 where CONTAINS(path999.additional_note, ?) > 0) UNION (select path_section999.consent_id from pdc_path_report_section path_section999, pdc_pathology_report path999 where path999.primary_path_report_section_id = path_section999.path_report_section_id and CONTAINS(path_section999.path_section_notes, ?) > 0) UNION (select consent999.consent_id from pdc_ardais_donor donor999, iltds_informed_consent consent999 where consent999.ardais_id = donor999.ardais_id and CONTAINS(donor999.donor_profile_notes, ?) > 0))
exists (select /*+ INDEX(ri0 ARD_LOGICAL_REPOS_ITEM_IN2) */ 1 from ard_logical_repos_item ri0 where ri0.item_id = sample.sample_barcode_id and %[ri0.repository_id = ?%])
exists (select /*+ INDEX(ri0 ARD_LOGICAL_REPOS_ITEM_IN2) */ 1 from ard_logical_repos_item ri0 where ri0.item_id = rna_batch_detail.rnavialid and %[ri0.repository_id = ?%])
exists (select 1 from iltds_box_location boxloc where sample.BOX_BARCODE_ID = boxloc.BOX_BARCODE_ID and boxloc.LOCATION_ADDRESS_ID = ?)
